objs.arg_0: behavior mode: 0-follows state of SW_A; 1-permanently opens once triggered; 2-toggles state on rising edge.
objs.description: A solid block that can be toggled using a switch. SW_A activates the object, arg0 controls the response. Default size: 32x32. Uses the 'locked-door' sprite when solid, and the 'crate' sprite when closed
An intangible object that displays a message when player interacts with it. Uses 'board' sprite
A logical AND object for switches. Sets SW_A to SW_C AND SW_D
An object that is collected when player interacts. Upon collection, it disappears, activates SW_Remove, and plays cutscene 'key'.

objs.text_arg: Name of camera config to switch to
objs.arg_0: Boolean. If nonzero, object is destroyed after triggering once
objs.description: An object that switches camera modes when player interacts with it.

objs.arg_0: Boolean. If nonzero, object is destroyed after triggering once
objs.description: An object that triggers a cutscene when player interacts with it.

objs.arg_0: Boolean. If nonzero, object is destroyed after triggering once
objs.SW_A: Switch that is triggered when contacting objects
objs.description: An object that activates a switch when player interacts with it.

objs.arg_0: Number of frames of contact required to initiate teleport
objs.arg_1: Selection mode: 0-only teleports player; 1-teleports player & entities; 2-teleports all objects
objs.arg_2: Behavior mode: treated as a bitfield. 0x1-bool: If true, object despawns after one use; 0x2-bool: If true, only activates if SW_A is active
objs.arg_3: Display mode: 0-invisible; 1-displays a light grey rectangle; 2-displays a texture. Option 2 is not implemented
objs.SW_A: Activation switch. Usage depends on arg_2
objs.description: An object that teleports objects to a predetermined spot

objs.SW_A: The object's internal state is written to SW_A when toggled
objs.description: A solid block that toggles its state when used. It writes its state to SW_A when changed. It has an adjustable cooldown between activations
A solid block with no special properties.
A solid block that damages the player when touched.
A solid block that can be pushed. Moves forward a set distance when used by player.
